data.title: 2024 video game release dates: PS5, PS4, Xbox, PC and Switch
data.meta_description: Looking for something to play? Here are all the upcoming video game release dates for August 2024 and beyond.
data.text:
Summer is almost at an end, but we still have a good few games left in August before we look ahead to the rest of the 2024 video game release dates for PS5, PS4, Xbox, PC and Switch.

Advertisement

The biggest game so far this month has definitely been Black Myth: Wukong, which has smashed player count records on Steam.

We've already had the re-release of Star Wars: Bounty Hunter, but the next trip to the galaxy isn't so far, far away, as we've got Star Wars Outlaws incoming at the end of August.

There has also been a slew of announcements made at the recent Gamescom Opening Night Live, which we have added to our list.

But with August coming to a close, our eyes turn next to September, which is set to have quite the cadence of releases. But with so little time and so many games, read on!

More like this
